issue.title: add hint text to Search field in Palette

content.raw:
I'm not sure what the best technical approach is, but here is the suggested behavior:

* Hint text appears by default
* Clicking into text field clears help text. Or, help text disappears when user starts typing.** 
* When user clicks out of text field, search query remains.
* If user deletes search query, help text reappears.

** One thing I want to avoid is the following annoying behavior I've seen in a few places: User clicks into a text field with help text. User starts typing, but help text doesn't clear, resulting in the search query appearing in the middle of the help text.

Does that make sense?
